reviewDescription: After about two years the door warped and doesn’t close properly. The manufacturer said the warranty is one year. So we have a piece of tape holding the door closed—until we toss the frig.
It works very well. Cools quickly and holds a case of 40 water bottles.

reviewTitle: Perfect compliment to a full size fridge
reviewDescription: This little fridge is a powerhouse! It's perfectly sized for my needs, keeps everything cool, and runs whisper-quiet. A fantastic addition to my space!
